Imports

toktok/lexer

Types

Lexer = object of BaseLexer
  kind: TokenKind
  token: string
  error: string
  startPos: int
  wsno: int
  multiLineStr: bool

LexerException = object of CatchableError
TokenKind {.pure.} = enum
  TK_UNKNOWN, TK_INTEGER, TK_FLOAT, TK_STRING, TK_IDENTIFIER, TK_EOF,
  TK_PLUS = "+", TK_MINUS = "-", TK_MULTI = "*", TK_EQ, TK_ASSIGN,
  TK_BLOCKCOMMENT, TK_INLINECOMMENT, TK_DIV, TK_LET = "let", TK_CONST = "const",
  TK_VAR = "var"
TokenTuple = tuple[kind: TokenKind, value: string, wsno: int, line: int,
                   col: int, pos: int]
